atk-s0503a3:154_1: yathāruci cintiyamānopi viparītappaṭipattiyā tato aññathābhāvī ahitadukkhabhāvī vighātaṁyeva
atk-s0503a3:154_2: pāpuṇāti. Bhavamevābhinandatīti evaṁ santepi taṁ maññanāparikappitaṁ avijjamānaṁ
atk-s0503a3:154_3: bhavaṁ vaḍḍhiṁ abhinandati eva abhikaṅkhati eva. Atha vā aññathābhāvīti “nicco me
atk-s0503a3:154_4: attā”tiādinā maññanāya parikappitākārato sayaṁ aññathābhāvī samāno anicco adhuvoti
atk-s0503a3:154_5: attho. Bhavasattoti kāmādibhavesu bhavataṇhāya satto laggo gadhito. Bhavamevābhinandatīti
atk-s0503a3:154_6: aniccādisabhāvaṁ bhavameva niccādivasena parāmasitvā, tattha vā adhimuttisaññaṁ taṇhādiṭṭhābhinandanāhi
atk-s0503a3:154_7: abhinandati, na tattha nibbindati. Yadabhinandati taṁ bhayanti yaṁ vaḍḍhisaṅkhātaṁ
atk-s0503a3:154_8: bhavaṁ kāmādibhavaṁ vā abhinandati, taṁ aniccādivipariṇāmasabhāvattā anekabyasanānubandhattā
atk-s0503a3:154_9: ca bhavahetubhāvato ativiya bhayānakaṭṭhena bhayaṁ. Yassa bhāyatīti yato jarāmaraṇādito
atk-s0503a3:154_10: bhāyati, taṁ jarāmaraṇādi dukkhādhiṭṭhānabhāvato dukkhadukkhabhāvato ca dukkhaṁ.
atk-s0503a3:154_11: Atha vā yassa bhāyatīti bhavābhinandanena yassa vibhavassa bhāyati, so ucchedasaṅkhāto
atk-s0503a3:154_12: vibhavo, tato bhāyanañca dukkhavatthubhāvato jātiādidukkhassa anativattanato ca dukkhaṁ
atk-s0503a3:154_13: dukkhasabhāvamevāti attho. Atha vā yassa bhāyati taṁ dukkhanti yassa aniccādikassa
atk-s0503a3:154_14: bhāyati taṁ nissaraṇaṁ ajānanto, taṁ bhayaṁ tassa dukkhaṁ hoti, dukkhaṁ āvahatīti attho.
atk-s0503a3:155_0: Ettakena vaṭṭaṁ dassetvā idāni vivaṭṭaṁ dassetuṁ, “bhavavippahānāya kho panidaṁ brahmacariyaṁ
atk-s0503a3:155_1: vussatī”ti āha. Tattha bhavavippahānāyāti kāmādibhavassa pajahanatthāya. Khoti avadhāraṇe,
atk-s0503a3:155_2: panāti padapūraṇe nipāto. Idanti āsannapaccakkhavacanaṁ. Brahmacariyanti maggabrahmacariyaṁ.
atk-s0503a3:155_3: Vussatīti pūressati. Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – ekanteneva kāmādibhavassa samudayappahānena
atk-s0503a3:155_4: anavasesapajahanatthāya idaṁ mayā satasahassakappādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni atidukkarāni
atk-s0503a3:155_5: ācaritvā pāramiyo pūretvā bodhimaṇḍe tiṇṇaṁ mārānaṁ matthakaṁ madditvā adhigataṁ
atk-s0503a3:156_0: Evaṁ ariyamaggassa ekaṁseneva niyyānikabhāvaṁ dassetvā idāni aññamaggassa tadabhāvaṁ
atk-s0503a3:156_1: dassento “ye hi kecī”tiādimāha. Tattha yeti aniyamaniddeso. Hīti nipātamattaṁ. Kecīti
atk-s0503a3:156_2: ekacce. Padadvayenāpi tathāvādino diṭṭhigatike aniyamato pariyādiyati. Samaṇāti pabbajjūpagamanamattena
atk-s0503a3:156_3: samaṇā, na samitapāpā. Brāhmaṇāti jātimattena brāhmaṇā, na bāhitapāpā. Vāsaddo vikappattho.
atk-s0503a3:156_4: Bhavena bhavassa vippamokkhamāhaṁsūti ekacce kāmabhavena rūpabhavena vā sabbabhavato
atk-s0503a3:157_0: Ke panevaṁ vadantīti? Diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādino tesu hi keci “uḷārehi pañcahi kāmaguṇehi
atk-s0503a3:157_1: samappito attā diṭṭheva dhamme paramaṁ nibbutiṁ patto hotī”ti vadanti. Keci “rūpāvacarajjhānesu
atk-s0503a3:157_3: paramaṁ nibbutiṁ patto hotī”ti vadanti. Yathāha –
atk-s0503a3:158: “Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṁvādī hoti evaṁdiṭṭhi ‘yato kho bho ayaṁ attā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito”’ti vitthāro.
atk-s0503a3:159_0: Te pana yasmā yāvadatthaṁ pītattā suhitāya jalūkāya viya ruhirapipāsā kāmādisukhehi
atk-s0503a3:159_1: samappitassa tassa attano kāmesanādayo na bhavissanti, tadabhāve ca bhavassa abhāvoyeva,
atk-s0503a3:159_2: yasmiṁ yasmiñca bhave ṭhitassa ayaṁ nayo labbhati, tena tena bhavena sabbabhavato
atk-s0503a3:159_3: vimutti hotīti vadanti, tasmā “bhavena bhavassa vippamokkhamāhaṁsū”ti vuttā. Yesañca
atk-s0503a3:159_4: “ettakaṁ nāma kālaṁ saṁsaritvā bālā ca paṇḍitā ca pariyosānabhave ṭhatvā saṁsārato
atk-s0503a3:159_5: vimuccantī”ti laddhi, tepi bhavena bhavassa vippamokkhaṁ vadanti nāma. Vuttañhetaṁ –
atk-s0503a3:160: “Cullāsīti mahākappino satasahassāni yāni bāle ca paṇḍite ca sandhāvitvā saṁsaritvā dukkhassantaṁ karissantī”ti.
atk-s0503a3:161_0: Atha vā bhavenāti bhavadiṭṭhiyā. Bhavati sassataṁ tiṭṭhatīti pavattanato sassatadiṭṭhi
atk-s0503a3:161_1: bhavadiṭṭhīti vuccati, bhavadiṭṭhi evettha uttarapadalopena bhavataṇhātiādīsu viya
atk-s0503a3:161_2: bhavoti vutto. Bhavadiṭṭhivasena ca ekacce bhavavisesaṁyeva kilesānaṁ vūpasantavuttiyā
atk-s0503a3:161_3: āyuno ca dīghāvāsatāya niccādisabhāvaṁ bhavavimokkhaṁ maññanti, seyyathāpi bako brahmā
atk-s0503a3:161_4: “idaṁ niccaṁ, idaṁ dhuvaṁ, idaṁ sassataṁ, idaṁ avipariṇāmadhamma”nti avoca. Tesamevaṁ
atk-s0503a3:161_5: viparītagāhīnaṁ anissaraṇe nissaraṇadiṭṭhīnaṁ kuto bhavavimokkho. Tenāha bhagavā
atk-s0503a3:162_0: Vibhavenāti ucchedena. Bhavassa nissaraṇamāhaṁsūti sabbabhavato niggamanaṁ nikkhantiṁ
atk-s0503a3:162_1: saṁsārasuddhiṁ vadiṁsu. Te hi “bhavena bhavassa vippamokkho”ti vadantānaṁ vādaṁ ananujānantā
atk-s0503a3:162_2: bhavūpacchedena nissaraṇaṁ paṭijāniṁsu. Vibhavenāti vā ucchedadiṭṭhiyā. Vibhavati
atk-s0503a3:162_3: vinassati ucchijjati attā ca loko cāti pavattanato ucchedadiṭṭhi vuttanayena “vibhavo”ti
atk-s0503a3:162_4: vuccati. Ucchedadiṭṭhivasena hi sattā adhimuccitvā tattha tattha uppannā ucchijjanti,
atk-s0503a3:163: “Yato kho bho ayaṁ attā rūpī cātumahābhūtiko…pe… nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati, ettāvatā kho bho ayaṁ attā sammā samucchinno hotī”ti.
atk-s0503a3:165: “Natthi, mahārāja, dinnaṁ, natthi yiṭṭhaṁ natthi hutaṁ…pe… bāle ca paṇḍite ca kāyassa bhedā ucchijjanti vinassanti na honti paraṁ maraṇā”ti ca.
atk-s0503a3:166_0: Tesampi evaṁ viparītagāhīnaṁ kuto bhavanissaraṇaṁ. Tenāha bhagavā – “sabbe te ‘anissaṭā
atk-s0503a3:166_1: bhavasmā’ti vadāmī”ti. Na hi ariyamaggabhāvanāya anavasesakilesaṁ asamugghātetvā
atk-s0503a3:166_2: kadācipi bhavato nissaraṇavimutti sambhavati. Tathā hi tesaṁ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṁ yathābhūtāvabodhābhāvato
atk-s0503a3:166_4: yato te diṭṭhigatikā pavattihetūsupi sammūḷhā sakkāyabhūmiyaṁ sunikhāte viparītadassanathambhe
atk-s0503a3:166_5: taṇhābandhanena baddhā gaddūlabandhanā viya sā na vijahanti bandhanaṭṭhānaṁ, kuto nesaṁ vimokkho?
atk-s0503a3:167_0: Ye pana catusaccavibhāvanena pavattiādīsu asammohato taṁ antadvayaṁ anupagamma majjhimaṁ
atk-s0503a3:167_1: paṭipadaṁ samāruḷhā, tesaṁyeva bhavavippamokkho nissaraṇañcāti dassento satthā “upadhiṁ
atk-s0503a3:167_2: hī”tiādimāha. Tattha upadhinti khandhādiupadhiṁ. Hīti nipātamattaṁ. Paṭiccāti nissāya,
atk-s0503a3:167_3: paccayaṁ katvā. Dukkhanti jātiādi dukkhaṁ. Kiṁ vuttaṁ hoti? Yatthime diṭṭhigatikā
atk-s0503a3:167_4: vimokkhasaññino, tattha khandhakilesābhisaṅkhārūpadhayo adhigatā, kuto tattha dukkhanissaraṇaṁ?
atk-s0503a3:167_5: Yatra hi kilesā, tatrābhisaṅkhārasambhavato bhavapabandhassa avicchedoyevāti vaṭṭadukkhassa
atk-s0503a3:167_6: anivatti. Tena vuttaṁ – “upadhiñhi paṭicca dukkhamidaṁ sambhotī”ti.
atk-s0503a3:168_0: Idāni yaṁ paramatthato dukkhassa nissaraṇaṁ, taṁ dassetuṁ, “sabbupādānakkhayā natthi
atk-s0503a3:168_1: dukkhassa sambhavo”ti vuttaṁ. Tattha sabbupādānakkhayāti kāmupādānaṁ diṭṭhupādānaṁ
atk-s0503a3:168_2: sīlabbatupādānaṁ attavādupādānanti sabbesaṁ imesaṁ catunnampi upādānānaṁ ariyamaggādhigamena
atk-s0503a3:168_3: anavasesappahānato. Tattha diṭṭhupādānaṁ sīlabbatupādānaṁ attavādupādānanti imāni
atk-s0503a3:168_4: tīṇi upādānāni sotāpattimaggena khīyanti, anuppattidhammataṁ āpajjanti. Kāmupādānaṁ
atk-s0503a3:168_5: apāyagamanīyaṁ paṭhamena, kāmarāgabhūtaṁ bahalaṁ dutiyena, sukhumaṁ tatiyena, rūparāgārūparāgappahānaṁ
atk-s0503a3:168_6: catutthenāti catūhipi maggehi khīyati, anuppattidhammataṁ āpajjatīti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0503a3:168_7: Natthi dukkhassa sambhavoti evaṁ sabbaso upādānakkhayā tadekaṭṭhatāya sabbassapi
atk-s0503a3:168_8: kilesagaṇassa anuppādanato appamattakassapi vaṭṭadukkhassa sambhavo pātubhāvo natthi.
atk-s0503a3:169_0: Evaṁ bhagavā hetunā saddhiṁ pavattiṁ nivattiñca dassetvā “imaṁ nayaṁ ajānanto ayaṁ
atk-s0503a3:169_1: sattaloko vaṭṭatopi sīsaṁ na ukkhipatī”ti dassento “lokamimaṁ passā”tiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0503a3:169_2: lokamimaṁ passāti attano buddhacakkhunā paccakkhato visayabhāvassa upagatattā “lokamimaṁ
atk-s0503a3:169_3: passā”ti bhagavādassanakiriyāya niyojento attānamevālapati. Puthūti bahū, visuṁ visuṁ
atk-s0503a3:169_4: vā. Avijjāya paretāti “dukkhe aññāṇa”ntiādinā nayena vuttāya catusaccapaṭicchādikāya
atk-s0503a3:169_5: avijjāya abhibhūtā. Bhūtāti kammakilesehi jātā nibbattā. Bhūtaratāti bhūtesu mātāpituputtadārādisaññāya
atk-s0503a3:169_6: aññasattesu taṇhāya ratā, bhūte vā khandhapañcake aniccāsubhadukkhānattasabhāve taṁsabhāvānavabodhato
atk-s0503a3:169_7: itthipurisādiparikappavasena niccādivasena attattaniyagāhavasena ca abhiratā. Bhavā
atk-s0503a3:169_8: aparimuttāti yathāvuttena taṇhādiṭṭhigāhena bhavato saṁsārato na parimuttā.
atk-s0503a3:170_0: Ettha ca “lokamima”nti paṭhamaṁ tāva sakalampi sattanikāyaṁ sāmaññato ekattaṁ upanento
atk-s0503a3:170_1: ekavacanena anodhiso gahaṇaṁ dīpetvā “svāyaṁ loko bhavayonigatiṭhitisattāvāsādivasena
atk-s0503a3:170_2: ceva tatthāpi taṁtaṁsattanikāyādivasena ca anekabhedabhinno paccekaṁ mayā volokito”ti
atk-s0503a3:170_3: attano buddhacakkhuñāṇānubhāvaṁ pakāsento satthā puna vacanabhedaṁ katvā bahuvacanena
atk-s0503a3:170_4: odhiso gahaṇaṁ dīpeti “puthū avijjāya paretā bhūtā”tiādinā. Evañca katvā “lokamima”nti
atk-s0503a3:170_6: hoti bhinnavākyattā. Keci pana ekavākyatādhippāyena “avijjāya paretaṁ bhūtaṁ bhūtarataṁ
atk-s0503a3:170_7: bhavā aparimutta”nti paṭhanti, vibhattibhedavaseneva pana purāṇapāṭho.
atk-s0503a3:171_0: Idāni yena upāyena bhavavippamokkho hoti, taṁ sabbaṁ titthiyānaṁ avisayabhūtaṁ buddhagocaraṁ
atk-s0503a3:171_1: vipassanāvīthiṁ dassento “ye hi kecī”tiādimāha. Tattha ye hi keci bhavāti kāmabhavādi
atk-s0503a3:171_2: saññībhavādi ekavokārabhavādivibhāgena nānābhedabhinnā sātavanto vā asātavanto vā
atk-s0503a3:171_3: dīghāyukā vā ittarakkhaṇā vā ye hi keci bhavā. Sabbadhīti uddhaṁ adho tiriyanti ādivibhāgena
atk-s0503a3:171_4: sabbattha. Sabbatthatāyāti saggāpāyamanussādivibhāgena. Sabbe tetiādīsu sabbepi te
atk-s0503a3:171_5: bhavā rūpavedanādidhammā hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā, udayabbayapaṭipīḷitattā dukkhā,
atk-s0503a3:171_6: jarāya maraṇena cāti dvidhā vipariṇāmetabbatāya vipariṇāmadhammā. Itisaddo ādiattho
atk-s0503a3:171_7: pakārattho vā, tena anattalakkhaṇampi saṅgahetvā avasavattanaṭṭhena anattā, vipariṇāmadhammatāya
atk-s0503a3:172_0: Evaṁ lakkhaṇattayapaṭivijjhanākārena etaṁ bhavasaṅkhātaṁ khandhapañcakaṁ yathābhūtaṁ
atk-s0503a3:172_1: aviparītaṁ sammappaññāya sammā ñāyena vipassanāsahitāya maggapaññāya passato pariññābhisamayādivasena
atk-s0503a3:172_2: paṭivijjhato “bhavo nicco”ti ādinayappavattā bhavesu taṇhā pahīyati, aggamaggappattisamakālameva
atk-s0503a3:172_3: anavasesaṁ nirujjhati, ucchedadiṭṭhiyā sabbaso pahīnattā vibhavaṁ vicchedaṁ nābhinandati
atk-s0503a3:172_4: na pattheti. Evaṁbhūtassa tassa yā kāmataṇhādivasena aṭṭhasatabhedā avatthādivibhāgena
atk-s0503a3:172_5: anantabhedā ca, tāsaṁ sabbaso sabbappakārena taṇhānaṁ khayā pahānā, tadekaṭṭhatāya
atk-s0503a3:172_6: sabbassapi saṁkilesapakkhassa asesaṁ nissesaṁ virāgena ariyamaggena yo anuppādanirodho, taṁ nibbānanti.
atk-s0503a3:173_0: Evaṁ taṇhāya pahānamukhena saupādisesanibbānaṁ dassetvā idāni anupādisesanibbānaṁ
atk-s0503a3:173_1: dassento “tassa nibbutassā”tiādimāha. Tassattho – yo so sabbaso taṇhānaṁ khayā kilesaparinibbānena
atk-s0503a3:173_2: nibbuto vuttanayena bhinnakileso khīṇāsavabhikkhu, tassa nibbutassa bhikkhuno anupādā
atk-s0503a3:173_3: upādānābhāvato kilesābhisaṅkhāramārānaṁ vā aggahaṇato punabbhavo na hoti, āyatiṁ
atk-s0503a3:173_4: paṭisandhivasena upapattibhavo natthi. Evaṁbhūtena ca tena abhibhūto māro, ariyamaggakkhaṇe
atk-s0503a3:173_5: kilesamāro abhisaṅkhāramāro devaputtamāro ca carimakacittakkhaṇe khandhamāro maccumāro
atk-s0503a3:173_6: cāti pañcavidho māro abhibhūto parājito, puna sīsaṁ ukkhipituṁ appadānena nibbisevano
atk-s0503a3:173_7: kato, yato tena vijito saṅgāmo mārehi tattha tattha pavattito. Evaṁ vijitasaṅgāmo
atk-s0503a3:173_8: pana iṭṭhādīsu sabbesu vikārābhāvena tādilakkhaṇappattiyā tādī arahā sabbabhavāni
atk-s0503a3:173_9: yathāvuttabhede sabbepi bhave upaccagā samatikkanto, na yattha katthaci saṅkhaṁ upeti,
atk-s0503a3:173_10: aññadatthu anupādāno viya jātavedo parinibbānato uddhaṁ apaññattikova hotīti. Iti
atk-s0503a3:173_11: bhagavā imaṁ mahāudānaṁ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā kūṭaṁ gahetvā niṭṭhapesi.
